src:
Tanpa Gol, Tanpa Intensitas dan Setumpuk Masalah Real Madrid
04 Nov 2019, 16:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid memang tidak kalah. Los Blancos hanya ditahan imbang Real Betis pada pekan ke-12 La Liga, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Hanya saja, hasil imbang tersebut dinilai sangat buruk oleh jurnalis Marca, Carlos Carpio.
Real Madrid memang tidak diharapkan hanya bermain imbang, bahkan kalah, saat berjumpa Real Betis. Sebab, tim arahan Zinedine Zidane tersebut itu punya peluang untuk berada di puncak klasemen La Liga.
Namun, Real Madrid tidak mampu meraih tiga poin. Madrid ditahan imbang 0-0 oleh Real Betis pada laga di Bernabeu. Madrid sempat mencetak gol lewat Eden Hazard, tetap kemudian dianulir VAR karena dalam posisi offside.
Real Madrid gagal menggusur Barcelona di puncak klasemen La Liga. Barca pada pekan ini menderita kekalahan dengan skor 3-1 atas Levante. Real Madrid dan Barcelona kini sama-sama memiliki 22 poin, dan Barca unggul selisih gol.
text:
No Goals, No Intensity and a Bunch of Real Madrid Problems
Nov 04 2019, 16:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid did not lose. Los Blancos were only held to a draw at Real Betis in the 12th week of La Liga, Sunday (11/03/2019) early morning hrs. It's just that the draw was considered very bad by Marca journalist, Carlos Carpio.
Real Madrid is not expected to only draw, even lose, when meeting Real Betis. Because, Zinedine Zidane's landing team has a chance to be at the top of the La Liga standings.
However, Real Madrid was unable to win three points. Madrid were held 0-0 by Real Betis in the match at the Bernabeu. Madrid had scored through Eden Hazard, VAR was then disallowed because it was in an offside position.
Real Madrid failed to displace Barcelona at the top of the La Liga standings. Barca this week suffered a 3-1 defeat of Levante. Real Madrid and Barcelona now have 22 points, and Barca are on goal difference.
